travelplanapp.travelplanapp

Class AlbumServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • travelplanapp.travelplanapp.AlbumServer

  • @Path(value="/album")
public class AlbumServer
extends java.lang.Object
    AlbumServer is a class in charge of serving data about albums and photos in album. The methods in this class consume HTTP GET requests and return data in JSON Format.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yanhong Ju

      • getGallery

        @GET
@Path(value="/getone/{albumName}")
public java.lang.String getGallery(@PathParam(value="albumName")
                                   java.lang.String albumName)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Consumes a HttpRequest with information about albumName. Produce a JSON String containing image imageUrl and Blobkey of each photo in this album.
        Parameters:
        albumName - the name of the album to be created
        response - HttpResponse to redirect
        Returns:
        JSON String containing image imageUrl and Blobkey
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Since:
        1.0

public java.lang.String getAllAlbums()
                              throws java.lang.Exception
